query: When is a goal scored in football?
expected_answer: When the whole ball crosses the goal line between the posts and under the crossbar.

query: Can a player be offside directly from a throw-in?
expected_answer: No, there is no offside offence directly from a throw-in.

query: How many players are on a team including the goalkeeper?
Is a goalkeeper allowed to handle a deliberate back-pass from a teammate?
expected_answer: No, handling a deliberate kick or throw-in from a teammate is an offence (indirect free kick).

query: What is the minimum distance opponents must keep at a free kick?
expected_answer: At least 10 yards (9.15 m) from the ball until it is in play.
